secret-key.name: Secret Key
secret-key.flavour_text_entry:
The key to the
CINNABAR ISLAND
GYM’s entrance.
secret-key.effect:
Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV
:   Unlocks the secret rotom room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom's form.
secret-key.short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom's appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.
